IllegalCommandException - Exception in network
Exception thrown if an illegal command occurs within a client-server -communication via the 'Kaskade'-protocol.

isEndOfTurn() - Method in class animation.AnimationStateQueue
Returns true if current inner queue contains the minimum amount of states needed to display a turn: This is true if all states that indicate a state transformation within a turn, have been removed.
